name: Autumn Clash!
description:
Premise

It's once again autumn time and your friend is coming to visit you in the forest. What a joyous occasion! There is just one small issue though...which is that an eldritch monster is guarding the way. No worries, you do this every year, you got this battle in the bag.

Controls 

A - move left

D -  move right

Space - jump

Left mouse click - shoot string

Things To Do

Speak to your friend to relive some fun memories and protect her journey across the forest. 

Defeat the eldritch monster to win the game.  You can eat fruit to restore your health, jump on mushrooms, and pull down branches to damage the monster.
